edu.berkeley.atdp.java.game.pong.character
Class Paddle

java.lang.Object
  edu.berkeley.atdp.java.game.character.NPC
      edu.berkeley.atdp.java.game.character.PC
          edu.berkeley.atdp.java.game.pong.character.Paddle

public class Paddle
extends PC

Extends the PC class in order to define a paddle in a game of pong.

Author:
Jonathan Berney

update

Updates the state of the paddle based on a change in time, the dimensions of the gamespace, and the GameObject containing the paddle.

Parameters:
